data.author: Afonso Santos

changelog.release_notes:
Pebble Time 2 support added.

app version number synchronized to SDK number
Code optimizations

For best results BOUNCING mode auto-switches other settings to:
 Pattern DOTS 
 Visibility TRANSLUCENT
 Illumination DIFFUSE

FLOATING mode has averaged sensor read-out for smother movements

No user interaction (no button pressed) auto-exit reduced to 120secs.

- oscillator wave speed doubled
- inertia of BOUNCING mode halved (reacts quicker to your movements)
- time-out before auto-exit doubled to 180 sec (more time needed to "play" in BOUNCING mode)

To prevent battery drain (if app forgotten running or launched by baby hands), after 90 seconds of no user interaction (no button pressed) the app will auto-exit.
Please let me know if you find this length to be too short/long.

B&W models (Pebble classic, Pebble steel & Pebble 2)
auto-invert colors for PATTERN_DOTS & ILLUMINATION_SPOTLIGHT

Detail modes added (Coarse/Fine)

Coarse: shadow and color change frontiers snap to the nearest control point in the active pattern grid. No anti-aliasing is applied.
Fine: shadow and color change frontiers are approximated to no more than 3 pixel error. Anti-aliasing is applied.

Colorizations simplified: SIGNAL discarded, MONOCHROMATIC & DISTANCE retained.

Illuminations simplified: 3 SPOTLIGHTS discarded (CPU cannot cope with so many calculations)
SHADOW renamed to (single) SPOTLIGHT.

New "Spotlights" illumination (2x long UP button press)

Warning: Warning: extremely computationally intensive so animation frame rate is expected to slow down immensely.

SHADOW toggling moved to long press on UP button.
simple press remains colorization change

New COLORIZATION_SHADOW (UP button to change)

Slows the rendering quite substantialy
Bug fixing: BOUNCING oscillator was broken on previous version.

Re-scaling of function domain (enlarged).
Re-positioning of camera (closer for more dramatic close-ups).
Pebble Classic & Steel gain PATTERN_STRIPES.

New PATTERN_STRIPES (doube the line density of PATTERN_LINES)
New TRANSPARENCY_XRAY (less visualy cluttered than TRANSPARENCY_TRANSLUCENT)

Transparency modes introduced.
Use long SELECT button press to toggle between opaque (slower) and translucent (faster)

Auto changing the plotting mode on every bounce was a bad idea. Reverted.
Plotting mode will only change on user request now.
plotterMode changes automaticaly on each bounce (BOUNCING mode only)

DOWN button function reassigned to long-DOWN.
DOWN becomes oscillator mode controller (Anchored/Floating/Bouncing)

New oscillator mode: BOUNCING
Reachable after 2 twist gestures. (space your gestures by 1s at least)

Gestures introduced

TWIST: oscillator mode (Anchored,Floating).
PUNCH: plotting mode (Dots,Lines,Grid).
YAIKS: reset to defaults.

data.description:
An interactive 3D math function demo.

*** BUTTONS ***
UP    : colorization (Monochromatic,Distance).
SELECT: pattern (Dots,Lines,Stripes,Grid).
DOWN  : oscillator (Anchored,Floating,Bouncing).

long UP: illumination (Diffuse,Spotlight)
long SELECT: transparency (Opaque,Xray,Translucent)
long DOWN  : detail (Coarse,Fine)

Coarse detail (faster): shadow and color change frontiers snap to the nearest control point in the active pattern grid. No anti-aliasing is applied.
Fine detail (slower): shadow and color change frontiers are approximated to no more than 3 pixel error. Anti-aliasing is applied.

latest_release.release_notes:
Pebble Time 2 support added.

app version number synchronized to SDK number

data.title: Ripples 3D
